p: The detection of cytokine/chemokine in BALF samples at day 6 post-infection showed that IL-6, MCP-1, G-CSF, TNF-α, CXCL1, CXCL10, CCL3, and RANTES were remarkably increased in the IAV group compared with those in the control group, while olaparib treatment significantly reduced the abnormal increased levels of the above cytokine/chemokines, which was similar with the results obtained from lung tissue (Fig. 4a-h).
